title: Emani varNintunammA
sahitya:
Emani varNintunammA shrI kaccapEshuni komma amma entani koniyADudunamma


anupallavi

  sAmajayAna shrI saundaryavalli natajana kalpavalli saraguna 
nanu brOvavamma nI caraNamulE gatiyanucu namminAnamma


caraNam    vanajAsanAdi vinuta mauktikapura janapada shubhada
sanaka vinuta suguNAbharaNa shAbhavi sukumAri gauri
kanakalita vINAvAdana kOvida mandahAsa yukta sumukha
kanaka kalasha sama payOdhara sAdara sadAshiva kavitrAsa hara 
			(ciTTasvara sAhitya)
janani dAsa mudAspada sudhA dharishiva udAra gati pada madavati
ripudamana surahita dAsajana shubadha budhanuta pada vijita dhanada
